mapper.select: SELECT r.prod_no prodNo, r.mid_prod_no midProdNo, s.prod_name prodName, m.mid_prod_name midProdName, concat_ws("/", r.mid_prod_no, m.mid_prod_name) midProdMsg, concat_ws("/", r.prod_no, s.prod_name) prodMsg, r.voucher_no voucherNo, r.change_flag changeFlag, r.change_item changeItem, r.change_emp changeEmp, r.old_value oldValue, r.new_value newValue, r.upd_date updDate FROM crafwork_change_record_plm r LEFT JOIN product_mid_plm m ON r.mid_prod_no = m.mid_prod_no AND r.company_id = m.company_id AND m.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN voucher_main_oa v ON v.voucher_no = r.voucher_no AND v.company_id = r.company_id AND v.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN product_store_plm s ON s.prod_no = r.prod_no AND s.company_id = r.company_id AND s.deleted = 'F' WHERE r.prod_no = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.mid_prod_no = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND v.is_finished = #{isFinished,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND r.deleted = 'F'

SELECT r.prod_no prodNo, r.mid_prod_no midProdNo, s.prod_name prodName, m.mid_prod_name midProdName, concat_ws("/", r.mid_prod_no, m.mid_prod_name) midProdMsg, concat_ws("/", r.prod_no, s.prod_name) prodMsg, r.voucher_no voucherNo, r.change_flag changeFlag, r.crafwork_id crafworkId, p.crafwork_name crafworkName, r.change_item changeItem, r.change_emp changeEmp, r.old_value oldValue, r.new_value newValue, r.upd_date updDate FROM crafwork_change_record_plm r LEFT JOIN product_mid_plm m ON r.mid_prod_no = m.mid_prod_no AND r.company_id = m.company_id AND m.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN crafwork_struct_plm p ON p.id = r.crafwork_id AND p.company_id = r.company_id AND p.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN product_store_plm s ON s.prod_no = r.prod_no AND s.company_id = r.company_id AND s.deleted = 'F' WHERE r.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND r.VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.deleted = 'F'

SELECT r.id id, r.prod_no prodNo, r.mid_prod_no midProdNo, s.prod_name prodName, m.mid_prod_name midProdName, concat_ws("/", r.mid_prod_no, m.mid_prod_name) midProdMsg, concat_ws("/", r.prod_no, s.prod_name) prodMsg, r.voucher_no voucherNo, r.change_flag changeFlag, r.crafwork_id crafworkId, p.crafwork_name crafworkName, r.change_item changeItem, r.change_emp changeEmp, r.old_value oldValue, r.new_value newValue, r.upd_date updDate FROM crafwork_change_record_plm r LEFT JOIN product_mid_plm m ON r.mid_prod_no = m.mid_prod_no AND r.company_id = m.company_id AND m.deleted = 'F' left join prod_crafwork_main_plm f on f.prod_no = r.prod_no and f.company_id = r.company_id and f.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN crafwork_struct_plm p ON p.id = r.crafwork_id AND p.company_id = r.company_id AND p.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN product_store_plm s ON s.prod_no = r.prod_no AND s.company_id = r.company_id AND s.deleted = 'F' WHERE r.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND r.VOUCHER_NO is null and f.path_no = #{pathNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND r.deleted = 'F'
